title: Sexcapades: Jane and the Jail Breaker
description: It’s not only the West that’s wild... Jane, the best little whore a brothel can have, meets her match when a sexy escaped outlaw strolls through the saloon's swinging doors and straight into her boudoir. But some men, Jane finds, don’t want to escape. Some want to be tied up and tied down. A jail breaker with a hankering for silk ties and very, VERY dirty play tests Jane's sexual skills, seducing her even as she pleasures him. About the series: Sexcapades is a series of uninhibited sexual escapades from your favorite best selling romance authors. www.sexcapades-stories.com
author: T.P. Wilder
